body_html:
I've also found it wasn't too hard to assemble manually all the .obj files from Bazel into a command file that we can then feed to MSVC instead of a static library cl @/path/to/objs.dos ...:
https://github.com/bytedeco/javacpp-presets/blob/4200f910a8c511ea67416de0bd1af67251b61a12/tensorflow/cppbuild.sh#L197-L213
body_text:
I've also found it wasn't too hard to assemble manually all the .obj files from Bazel into a command file that we can then feed to MSVC instead of a static library cl @/path/to/objs.dos ...:
https://github.com/bytedeco/javacpp-presets/blob/4200f910a8c511ea67416de0bd1af67251b61a12/tensorflow/cppbuild.sh#L197-L213
body:
I've also found it wasn't too hard to assemble manually all the .obj files from Bazel into a command file that we can then feed to MSVC instead of a static library `cl @/path/to/objs.dos ...`:
https://github.com/bytedeco/javacpp-presets/blob/4200f910a8c511ea67416de0bd1af67251b61a12/tensorflow/cppbuild.sh#L197-L213
